original_text: All those rich people have plenty of money. They only gave a small part of that. But this woman has almost nothing. She put everything that she had into the box. That money was what she needed to live.’
korean_text: 저들은 그 풍족한 중에서 헌금을 넣었거니와 이 과부는 그 가난한 중에서 자기가 가지고 있는 생활비 전부를 넣었느니라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: All those rich people have plenty of money.
They only gave a small part of that.
But this woman has almost nothing.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 이 여인은 거의 아무것도 없습니다.

sentences.original_text: She put everything that she had into the box.
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 가진 모든 것을 상자에 넣었습니다.

sentences.original_text: That money was what she needed to live.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 돈은 그녀가 살기 위해 필요한 것이었습니다.
